The DataViz focuses on the results of labour inspections and the relevance behind each fiscalização (inspection in the visualisation). Whether one or 1,064 rescues, each star symbolises justice for workers. At the same time, it serves as a reminder of the immense task ahead, the vast territory to be covered, the potential gaps or voids yet to be explored, and the need to strengthen the capacity of the inspectorate to continue its effort.

More inspectors mean a greater capacity to identify spots of vulnerability and eradicate degrading working conditions.
